title: Books on Mesmerism and the Masonic Tradition in Psychology
first_phrase: In this text, we dive into the ancient practice of Mesmerism and its influence on psychology. Before delving into recommended works, we learn that Carl Gustav Jung wrote about the usefulness of the ancient Masonic Tradition in psychology, which helps non-Masonic readers understand this unique style of writing. The previous 200 tokens recommend several significant books on Mesmerism starting from the 18th century. These books range from historical accounts to critical and experimental studies of magnetism's properties, physiology, and therapeutic use.
